document_title: Breast enlargement: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_content:
Breast enlargement often has the following symptoms:
Initially, the nipples are enlarged, touching the nipples feels like the center may have a large, firm, solid nucleus.; This nucleus increasingly spreads into a halo that we can move and feel like a cushion in the breast.; Breast volume is many times larger; Breasts sag, the greater the degree of hypertrophy, the more severe the sagging is.; The skin of the chest area is stretchy and flabby; Breast pain.; Pain in back, shoulders, neck.; Infection or abscess; Loss of nipple sensation; Redness, itching, warmth above or below the breast.
